name: Life Domain
description: Clerics who focus on healing and protecting life, channeling vitality to sustain their allies.

3.Bonus Proficiencies: You gain proficiency with Heavy armor.
3.Disciple of Life: Whenever you cast a spell using a spell slot to restore Hit Points to a creature, the creature regains additional Hit Points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

Domain Spells.description: You always have certain spells prepared. They don't count against your number of prepared spells.

6.Preserve Life: As a Channel Divinity, restore Hit Points equal to 5 times your Cleric level. Choose creatures within 30 feet and divide HP among them. Can't bring a creature above half its HP maximum. Can't affect Undead or Constructs.

17.Supreme Healing: When you would normally roll one or more dice to restore Hit Points with a spell, instead use the highest number possible for each die. Example: instead of restoring 2d6 HP, restore 12 HP.
